segment.source: The following list contains the current known issues with the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) 3.0.
segment.target: The following list contains the current known issues with the Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) 3.0.

segment.source: The VAMT Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI) remote operations may take longer to execute if the target computer is in a sleep or standby state.
segment.target: The VAMT Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI) remote operations may take longer to execute if the target computer is in a sleep or standby state.

segment.source: Recovery of Non-Genuine computers is a two-step process.
segment.target: Recovery of Non-Genuine computers is a two-step process.

segment.source: VAMT can be used to install a new product key and activate the computer.
segment.target: VAMT can be used to install a new product key and activate the computer.

segment.source: However, the computer itself must visit the Windows Genuine Advantage Web site to revalidate the computer's Genuine status.
segment.target: However, the computer itself must visit the Windows Genuine Advantage Web site to revalidate the computer's Genuine status.

segment.source: Upon successfully completing this step, the computer will be restored to full functionality.
segment.target: Upon successfully completing this step, the computer will be restored to full functionality.

segment.source: For more information on recovering Non-Genuine Windows computers, go to Windows Volume Activation.
segment.target: For more information on recovering Non-Genuine Windows computers, go to Windows Volume Activation.

segment.source: When opening a Computer Information List (.cil file) saved in a previous version of VAMT, the edition information is not shown for each product in the center pane.
segment.target: When opening a Computer Information List (.cil file) saved in a previous version of VAMT, the edition information is not shown for each product in the center pane.

segment.source: Users must update the product status again to obtain the edition information.
segment.target: Users must update the product status again to obtain the edition information.

segment.source: The remaining activation count can only be retrieved for MAKs.
segment.target: The remaining activation count can only be retrieved for MAKs.
